member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the RadWebCam class.

member.name: E:Telerik.Windows.Controls.RadWebCam.SnapshotTaken
member.summary: Occurs when a snapshot is taken. If is set to true the event is fired only if the SaveSnapshot command is executed.

member.name: E:Telerik.Windows.Controls.RadWebCam.RecordingStarted
member.summary: Occurs when video recording is started.

member.name: E:Telerik.Windows.Controls.RadWebCam.RecordingEnded
member.summary: Occurs when video recording has ended.

member.name: E:Telerik.Windows.Controls.RadWebCam.CameraError
member.summary: Occurs when an error is preventing the camera from operating normally.

member.name: P:Telerik.Windows.Controls.RadWebCam.PreviewSnapshots
member.summary: Gets or sets whether the control will go into preview mode when a snapshot is taken.

member.name: P:Telerik.Windows.Controls.RadWebCam.AutoStart
member.summary: Gets or sets whether the control will start the first webcam it finds upon starting the application.

member.name: P:Telerik.Windows.Controls.RadWebCam.FlipVertically
member.summary: Gets or sets whether the control will flip the incoming video feed vertically.

member.name: P:Telerik.Windows.Controls.RadWebCam.FlipHorizontally
member.summary: Gets or sets whether the control will flip the incoming video feed horizontally.

member.summary: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the source content is being recorded to a file.

member.summary: Gets a value indicating whether the control is in snapshot preview mode.

member.summary: Gets a value indicating whether the camera is in an error state.

member.summary: Gets a value indicating the content of the error message.

member.summary: Gets or sets the format of the elapsed time displayed during recording.

member.summary: Gets or sets the location where video files are stored when capturing.

member.summary: Gets or sets the visibility of the Settings button.

member.summary: Gets or sets the visibility of the Toolbar panel that hosts all the camera built-in controls.

member.summary: Gets a list with all the available audio capture devices.

member.summary: Gets a list with all the available video file formats for the provided device.

If set to true - only formats that allow saving to a video file will be returned.

member.summary: Starts up the video pipeline and displays the video from the source inside of the control. The device to use as a video source. The format from the video source.

member.summary: Starts up the video pipeline and displays the video from the source inside of the control. The device to use as a video source. The format from the video source. The device to use as a audio source.

member.name: M:Telerik.Windows.Controls.RadWebCam.Start
member.summary: Starts the video pipeline and starts displaying the video feed.

member.name: M:Telerik.Windows.Controls.RadWebCam.Pause
member.summary: Pauses the video pipeline and pauses displaying the video feed.

member.name: M:Telerik.Windows.Controls.RadWebCam.Stop
member.summary: Stops the video pipeline and stops displaying the video feed.

member.name: M:Telerik.Windows.Controls.RadWebCam.StartRecording
member.summary: Starts capturing the media source(s) to a file. The property must be set before calling this method.

member.name: M:Telerik.Windows.Controls.RadWebCam.StopRecording
member.summary: Stops the file capture.

member.name: M:Telerik.Windows.Controls.RadWebCam.OnApplyTemplate
member.summary: When overridden in a derived class, is invoked whenever application code or internal processes call .

member.name: M:Telerik.Windows.Controls.RadWebCam.TakeSnapshot
member.summary: Takes a snapshot from the currently displayed video feed. To get the snapshot subscribe to the event.

member.name: M:Telerik.Windows.Controls.RadWebCam.SaveSnapshot
member.summary: Saves the snapshot that is currently being previewed. must be set to true and the control must be previewing a snapshot triggered by calling .

member.name: M:Telerik.Windows.Controls.RadWebCam.DiscardSnapshot
member.summary: Discards the snapshot that is currently being previewed. must be set to true and the control must be previewing a snapshot triggered by calling .

member.name: M:Telerik.Windows.Controls.RadWebCam.StartRecordingCore
member.summary: Starts capturing the content of the source(s) to a file. This call must be made in a new thread as Windows Media Foundation must run in a MTAThread and WPF is STAThread.

member.name: M:Telerik.Windows.Controls.RadWebCam.StopRecordingCore
member.summary: Stops capturing the content of the source(s) to a file. This call must be made in a new thread as Windows Media Foundation must run in a MTAThread and WPF is STAThread.
